# shared

**Type Property**

The shared upcoming media manager.

## Declaration

```swift
class var shared: INUpcomingMediaManager { get }
```

## Discussion

Always use the shared upcoming media manager instead of creating an instance of [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INUpcomingMediaManager] with an initializer method.
title: shared
